notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction in the Tuhure Pasal area of Nepal. Located roughly 27 to 31 kilometers southwest of the 25 April 2015 earthquake epicenter, the Tuhure Pasal area was impacted by this event. Using satellite imagery acquired 03 May 2015 UNITAR / UNOSAT identified a total of 86 affected structures in the Tuhure Pasal area. Approximately 32 of these were destroyed, 21 severely damaged, and 33 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
